translations: v.对……有明显作用（或影响）；妨碍；侵犯，侵占；撞击

phrs.translation: 影响；撞击；侵犯；紧密接触

sentences.sentence: He never allowed his work to impinge on his private life.
sentences.translation: 他从不让他的工作妨碍私生活。

sentences.sentence: They can turn down applications from scientists they believe will work against their interests, or research projects that will impinge too much on their daily lives and traditional activities.
sentences.translation: 他们可以拒绝他们认为会与自己利益相悖的科学家的申请，或者对他们的日常生活和传统活动影响太大的研究项目。

sentences.sentence: It may not come as a surprise to parents, but having children really does impinge on marital bliss.
sentences.translation: 也许这对于为人父母者来说并不奇怪，但生孩子的确会影响婚姻幸福。
